name: Lights Out (itch) (Fowlron)
description:
We are all familiar with the irrational fear of turning off our lights in the middle of the night and having to run as fast as possible to our room to escape the "demons" in the dark.

This is what you have to do. Turn off all the lights in your house and go to bed before the demon gets you first.

But be careful, you have to avoid all of the obstacles in the way or else...

----

Controls:

  • WASD: Movement
  • Space: Jump, advance in menu

---

A game developed by a GameDevTecnico team for the One Minute Jam.

Andreia Santos (meiko_bruxami)

Marisa Miranda (Fidjiby)

Pedro Godinho

Samuel Barata
